Gaara sends the opponent into the air where Lee kicks the opponent. Gaara then uses Quicksand Waterfall Flow and Lee appears from inside the tsunami of [[sand]], and kicks the opponent into it. As the opponent slowly descends, the sand proceeds, and they drown in it.

[[es:Taijutsu Tsunami de Arena]]
[[pl:Taijutsu Piaskowego Tsunami]]
